author: jleroux
msg: changed the sql generated from the table-type field (used to specify the table type in mysql) from TYPE (deprecated in 4.1 and removed in 5.5.8 (maybe prior) to use the ENGINE keyword instead; creating tables in mysql 5.5.8 now working again
